title: This queue time better not increase with the new champion select
body:
I'm merely d3 and I have to sit in queue this long with the current system. Riot claim queue times will be reduced with the new system but I'm still skeptical. Does anyone have any experience on the pbe with how the new system functions in regards to queue times or has anyone stumble across some quotes from riot employees explaining how they believe the new system will reduce queue times?. 

Btw I had to wait until 17 minutes for my game to pop only to have to dodge -_-

replies.body: Yeah thats the reason i purposely stay in diamond 5, totes.
